atten4.ptxt: A bolt without a torque specification is shown in the standard bolt chart (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 3 SIDE RAIL SPACER LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws to install the rear No. 3 side rail spacer.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 3 SIDE RAIL SPACER LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws to install the rear No. 3 side rail spacer.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 3 SIDE RAIL SPACER RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SIDE RAIL SPACER LH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for all rear No. 2 side rail spacers.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the rear No. 2 side rail spacer.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SIDE RAIL SPACER RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SIDE RAIL SPACER

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the side rail spacer.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SIDE RAIL SPACER LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws to install the front side rail spacer.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT SIDE RAIL SPACER RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL ROOF HEADLINING ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Place the roof headlining into the vehicle as shown in the illustration.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the roof headlining when placing it.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 fasteners to install the roof headlining.
Install the 8 clips.
Connect the connectors and attach the 5 clamps to the front pillar.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL ASSIST GRIP

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for all assist grips.

s2.ptxt: Install the assist grip with the 2 screws.
Attach the 4 claws and close the 2 covers.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL VISOR HOLDER LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the visor holder.
Install the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL VISOR HOLDER RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL VISOR ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Install the visor with the 2 screws.
Attach the guide.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL VISOR ASSEMBLY RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL COOLER CONTROL SWITCH ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Connect the connector.
Attach the 2 clips to install the cooler control switch assembly (rear blower control switch) as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 2 ROOM LIGHT ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Connect the light connector.
Install the room light with the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 1 ROOM LIGHT ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Connect the light connector.
Install the room light with the 2 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL MAP LIGHT ASSEMBLY (w/ Map Light)

s2.ptxt: Connect the connector.
Attach the 2 guides and claw.
Install the 2 screws to install the map light assembly.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL INNER UPPER ROOF SIDE GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 5 clips to install the inner upper roof side garnish.
Connect the rear No. 2 seat belt shoulder anchor with the bolt.
Attach the 2 claws to close the rear No. 2 seat belt shoulder anchor cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL INNER UPPER ROOF SIDE GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL QUARTER PILLAR GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips to install the quarter pillar garnish.
Connect the rear No. 1 seat belt shoulder anchor with the bolt.
Attach the 2 claws to close the rear No. 1 seat belt shoulder anchor cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL QUARTER PILLAR GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL QUARTER INSIDE TRIM BOARD LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws, 8 clips and 2 guides to install the quarter inside trim board.
Install the clip.
Connect the rear No. 1 seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.
Connect the rear No. 2 seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL QUARTER INSIDE TRIM BOARD RH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws, 8 clips and 2 guides to install the quarter inside trim board.
Install the clip.
Connect the rear No. 1 seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.
Connect the rear No. 2 seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL QUARTER TRIM HOOK

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for both quarter trim hooks.

s2.ptxt: Install the quarter trim hook with the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR SCUFF PLATE

s2.ptxt: Attach the 6 clips and 4 claws to install the back door scuff plate.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL CENTER PILLAR GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the guide and clip to install the center pillar garnish.
Connect the front seat belt shoulder anchor with the bolt.
Attach the 4 claws to install the front seat belt shoulder anchor cover.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL CENTER PILLAR GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LOWER CENTER PILLAR GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the lower center pillar garnish.
Connect the front seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LOWER CENTER PILLAR GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR OPENING TRIM WEATHERSTRIP LH

s2.ptxt: Align the paint mark on the rear door opening trim weatherstrip with the mark position on the vehicle and install the rear door opening trim weatherstrip as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR OPENING TRIM WEATHERSTRIP RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR SCUFF PLATE LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips and 7 claws to install the rear door scuff plate.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR SCUFF PLATE RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR OPENING TRIM LH

s2.ptxt: Align the paint mark on the front door opening trim with the mark position on the vehicle and install the front door opening trim as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR OPENING TRIM RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR SCUFF PLATE LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips and 7 claws to install the front door scuff plate.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT DOOR SCUFF PLATE RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT PILLAR GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips to install the front pillar garnish.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT PILLAR GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LOWER FRONT PILLAR GARNISH LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws and 3 guides to install the lower front pillar garnish.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL LOWER FRONT PILLAR GARNISH RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT ASSEMBLY
CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL (w/ Airbag System)

atten3.ptxt: When disconnecting the cable, some systems need to be initialized after the cable is reconnected (See page ).
